Author: mithro_

Author: mole99
Content:
The only remaining DRC issue is the NDRES.4 rule, which is flagged in the I/O cells.

However, as this rule is not even included in the open PDK docs, I will disable it for now while Tim E. reviews it.

Author: mithro_
Content: @mole99 - I assume it's a `make clone-pdk` and then close and re-enter the `nix-shell` should work?

Author: mole99
Content:
There have also been changes to the template, so:

1. git pull the latest changes to the template
2. make clone-pdk
3. nix-shell
4. make librelane

Once we have upstreamed all our changes to the PDK, step 2 will no longer be necessary.
